id.description: The unique identifier of the visitor data.

page_view_count.description: The count of page views by the visitor.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the visitor.

campaign_parameter.description: The campaign parameter associated with the visitor.

medium_parameter.description: The medium parameter associated with the visitor.

source_parameter.description: The source parameter associated with the visitor.

content_parameter.description: The content parameter associated with the visitor.

term_parameter.description: The term parameter associated with the visitor.

created_at.description: The date and time when the visitor data was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the visitor data was last updated.
